response.overview: Samvedna, a doctor and a fun-loving girl by nature, meets an introverted stranger en-route a resort, and they plan to spend a day amongst the beautiful locations of Goa. During their journey, she describes about her love story with this "stranger", in an attempt to get better understanding about her boyfriend Varun. While they spend time each other along the way catching glimpses of scenic places in Goa which in turn unravels a mysterious journey that forms the rest of the story.
response.title: Strangers
